dublinCore.dc:title: 113 SRES 96 IS: Recognizing the celebration of National Student Employment Week at the University of Minnesota Duluth.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Ms. Klobuchar submitted the following resolution; which was referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

form.official-title: Recognizing the celebration of National Student Employment Week at the University of Minnesota Duluth.

whereas.text: Whereas there are nearly 1,500 student employees at the University of Minnesota Duluth;
Whereas the University of Minnesota Duluth recognizes the importance of student employees to their employers; and
Whereas National Student Employment Week is celebrated the week of April 8 through 12, 2013: Now, therefore, be it

section.text: That the Senate recognizes the celebration of National Student Employment Week at the University of Minnesota Duluth.
